00061 int RainbruRPG::Terminal::MenuItem::fireAction(){
00062   if (actionSet){
00063     int ret=(*(fptr))();
00064     return ret;
00065   }
00066   else{
00067     return -1;
00068   }
00069 }

00097 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::MenuItem::setAction(FuncPtr a){
00098   this->fptr=a;
00099   actionSet=true;
00100 
00101 }
